description: Adds tags to an IoT SiteWise resource. If a tag already exists for the resource, this operation updates the tag's value.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the resource to tag.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the resource. For more information, see Tagging your IoT SiteWise resources in the IoT SiteWise User Guide. (string) --- (string) ---
